definition: to take aim/(fig.) to aim one's looks at/to glance at
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: According to the detection method , it has designed a set of detection systems of photoelectric helmet sighting device.
sentences.chinese: 根据检测方法，设计了一套光电头盔瞄准具检测系统。

sentences.english: The gunsight would have been switched on during the search period and adjusted for brightness.
sentences.chinese: 在搜索期间，应该打开瞄准具，并且调整亮度。

sentences.english: Two adjusting screws harmonise the guns with the sight.
sentences.chinese: 有两个调节钮来校准武器和瞄准具。

sentences.english: I believe this sight would improve gunnery at least 100 percent.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这种瞄准具可以100%的提升射击技术。

sentences.english: There shall be no restriction on the type of sights except AS specified in Appendix E .
sentences.chinese: 除非附录E中有注明，否则不应限制瞄准具之种类。

sentences.english: All results are useful to study and develop the helmet sight system.
sentences.chinese: 所得结果有助于国内头盔瞄准具的研究和发展。

sentences.english: It could be widely applied to gun-sight of pilot bombing simulator.
sentences.chinese: 能广泛地应用于领航轰炸模拟器的瞄准具上。
